name: CFRunLoopSourceContext
desc: A structure that contains program-defined data and callbacks with which you can configure a version 0 CFRunLoopSourceâ€™s behavior.

items.name: init(version: CFIndex, info: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!, retain: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> UnsafeRawPointer?)!, release: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> Void)!, copyDescription: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> Unmanaged<CFString>?)!, equal: ((UnsafeRawPointer?, UnsafeRawPointer?) -> DarwinBoolean)!, hash: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> CFHashCode)!, schedule: ((UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, CFRunLoop?, CFRunLoopMode?) -> Void)!, cancel: ((UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, CFRunLoop?, CFRunLoopMode?) -> Void)!, perform: ((UnsafeMutableRawPointer?) -> Void)!)
var cancel: ((UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, CFRunLoop?, CFRunLoopMode?) -> Void)!
items.desc: A cancel callback for the run loop source. This callback is called when the source is removed from a run loop mode. Can be NULL.

items.name: var copyDescription: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> Unmanaged<CFString>?)!
items.desc: A copy description callback for your program-defined info pointer. Can be NULL.

items.name: var equal: ((UnsafeRawPointer?, UnsafeRawPointer?) -> DarwinBoolean)!
items.desc: An equality test callback for your program-defined info pointer. Can be NULL.

items.name: var hash: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> CFHashCode)!
items.desc: A hash calculation callback for your program-defined info pointer. Can be NULL.

items.name: var info: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!
items.desc: An arbitrary pointer to program-defined data, which can be associated with the CFRunLoopSource at creation time. This pointer is passed to all the callbacks defined in the context.

items.name: var perform: ((UnsafeMutableRawPointer?) -> Void)!
items.desc: A perform callback for the run loop source. This callback is called when the source has fired.

items.name: var release: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> Void)!
items.desc: A release callback for your program-defined info pointer. Can be NULL.

items.name: var retain: ((UnsafeRawPointer?) -> UnsafeRawPointer?)!
items.desc: A retain callback for your program-defined info pointer. Can be NULL.

items.name: var schedule: ((UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, CFRunLoop?, CFRunLoopMode?) -> Void)!
items.desc: A scheduling callback for the run loop source. This callback is called when the source is added to a run loop mode. Can be NULL.

items.name: var version: CFIndex
items.desc: Version number of the structure. Must be 0.
